intake.trainingGoal: Build muscle mass, increase strength, aesthetic gains
intake.additionalInfo: Been lifting for 3 years. Did bro split before, switching to PPL for more frequency. Want to hit 225 bench, 315 squat, 405 deadlift. Track everything meticulously - RPE, tempo, rest times. Fitness is my lifestyle.

programs.name: PPL Hypertrophy Program
programs.description: Classic 6-day Push/Pull/Legs split focused on hypertrophy with progressive overload. High volume, moderate intensity with compound lifts as foundation.

workoutPlan.phaseExplanation: Building training volume and muscle mass through progressive overload. Focus on compound movements with accessory work for weak points.

workouts.name: Push A - Chest Focus
workouts.warmup: 5 min incline walk, arm circles, band pull aparts, light bench press
workouts.cooldown: Chest stretch, shoulder stretch, tricep stretch

workouts.name: Pull A - Back Width
workouts.warmup: 5 min row machine, band pull aparts, face pulls
workouts.cooldown: Lat stretch, bicep stretch, back stretches

exercises.name: Barbell Row
exercises.notes: Overhand grip, row to lower chest

exercises.name: Face Pull
exercises.notes: Rear delt focus, external rotation at top

workouts.name: Legs A - Quad Focus
workouts.warmup: 5 min bike, leg swings, bodyweight squats, empty bar squats
workouts.cooldown: Quad stretch, hamstring stretch, hip flexor stretch

exercises.name: Barbell Squat
exercises.notes: Main compound - depth below parallel, RPE 8-9

exercises.name: Leg Curl
exercises.notes: Lying or seated - squeeze at top

exercises.name: Standing Calf Raise
exercises.notes: Full stretch at bottom, pause at top

workouts.name: Push B - Shoulder Focus
workouts.warmup: 5 min cardio, shoulder circles, band dislocates, light OHP
workouts.cooldown: Shoulder stretch, chest stretch, tricep stretch

exercises.name: Overhead Press
exercises.notes: Main compound - strict form, no leg drive

exercises.name: Incline Bench Press
exercises.notes: 30 degree incline, upper chest and front delts

exercises.name: Dumbbell Flyes
exercises.notes: Slight bend in elbows, stretch at bottom

exercises.name: Cable Lateral Raise
exercises.notes: Single arm, cross body start position

exercises.name: Dips
exercises.notes: Slight forward lean for chest, upright for triceps

workouts.name: Pull B - Back Thickness
workouts.warmup: 5 min row, band pull aparts, light rows
workouts.cooldown: Lat stretch, bicep stretch, thoracic mobility

exercises.name: Deadlift
exercises.notes: Main compound - conventional, belt up, RPE 8

exercises.name: Dumbbell Row
exercises.notes: Single arm, full stretch and contraction

workouts.name: Legs B - Hamstring Focus
workouts.warmup: 5 min bike, leg swings, RDL with empty bar
workouts.cooldown: Hamstring stretch, hip flexor stretch, glute stretch

exercises.name: Romanian Deadlift
exercises.notes: Main hinge - feel the stretch, controlled

exercises.name: Hack Squat
exercises.notes: Quad focus, feet low on platform

exercises.name: Leg Extension
exercises.notes: Finisher - drop set on last set

workoutLogs.notes: Week 1 Day 1. Starting fresh with PPL. Bench felt good, testing my working weights.

exerciseLogs.notes: RPE 8 on working sets. Form felt solid.

workoutLogs.notes: Pull A. Back felt strong. Good mind-muscle connection on rows.

exerciseLogs.notes: Lats engaged well, good stretch at top
Kept torso at 45 degrees, no heaving

workoutLogs.notes: Leg day. Squats felt heavy but hit depth on all reps. Quads destroyed.

exerciseLogs.notes: RPE 8. Good depth, knees tracking well.

workoutLogs.notes: Push B. OHP felt strong today. Shoulders are growing.

exerciseLogs.notes: Strict form, no leg drive. RPE 8.

workoutLogs.notes: Pull B. Deadlift day - love it. Hit 315 for 5!
Legs B. Saturday morning session. Hamstring focus - great pump.

exerciseLogs.notes: Drop set on last set - quads on fire

workoutLogs.notes: Week 2 Push A. Answered check-in - going great! Bench progression feels good.
Pull A. Back feeling wider. Rows are getting stronger.
Legs A. Squats moving well. Hit 245 for 6!
Push B. OHP still climbing. Shoulders responding well to frequency.

exerciseLogs.notes: +1-2 reps per set from last week

workoutLogs.notes: Pull B. Deadlift PR - 335x5! Chasing that 405.

exerciseLogs.notes: 335x5! PR! +20 lbs from last week. RPE 9 but grip held!

workoutLogs.notes: Week 2 Legs B. Hamstrings and glutes feeling the volume.

exerciseLogs.notes: +10 lbs from last week, hamstrings stretched

workoutLogs.notes: Week 3 Push A. Bench is flying! 205 incoming.
Pull A. Back width noticeable in mirror. PPL frequency is working.
Legs A. Squats hit 265! Approaching that 3 plate mark.
Push B. OHP hit 125. Shoulders are capped.
Pull B. Deadlift hit 355x5! Getting close to 405!

exerciseLogs.notes: 355x5! RPE 9. 50 lbs to go for 405. Mixed grip held.

workoutLogs.notes: Week 3 Legs B. Posterior chain is growing. Girls mirin.
Week 4 Push A. 21-day streak! Bench hit 205 for 6 clean. Feeling unstoppable.

exerciseLogs.notes: 205x6x2! Both work sets clean! 225 is close. RPE 8

checkIns.notes: Starting my PPL program. Been lifting for 3 years but switching from bro split for more frequency. Goals: 225 bench, 315 squat, 405 deadlift. Currently at 185/225/315. Let's get these gains!

Week 2 complete! PPL is hitting different. Already seeing strength gains - bench 195x6 (was 185), squat 245x6 (was 225), deadlift 335x5 (was 315). Body comp improving. Eating in slight surplus, sleep is on point. 21-day streak loading!
